answers.answer: I'm 33w5d & weigh 200 to be honest I didn't know how much I weight before but it was around 170.
Its the bby weight and urs.
I started at 150 and was 197 when i delivered 30 of that weight i still have :( unfortunitly be really careful you could end up with diabetes after u give birth.

With my first pregnancy I gained about 40 lbs but after have birth lost it all in like 2 weeks, but putting that weight back on is easy, so I wouldn't worry about it right know, I'm sure you'll lose it all, but be careful after birth to not put it back on!! I put all mine back on :(

With my first I was 98lbs and delivered at 202lbs 8-/ it didn't matter what I did, I still gained weight, but I was down to 120 within six months. With my second it wasn't so drastic I gained what I was "supposed" to, and with this baby I can't seem to gain weight, I lost 25 pounds the first couple months and have only gained 1 pound back at 20+5. Every pregnancy is different.

question: Pre pregnancy I weighted 143 and now I am 37 weeks pregnant and I weight 224. I don't eat any different than before, I do drink a lot of juices. I don't understand it. I am always up walking around. No matter what I do I just put  on weight. I keep telling myself that its all water weight. But I am retaining fluid around my feet, ankles and legs.
title: Is this bad?
